sheet.name: 주문_목록_2024년도_월별현황
sheet.query: SELECT TOP 13 OrderID, CustomerID, OrderDate, EmployeeID, Freight FROM [Order] ORDER BY OrderDate DESC

sheet.name: 고객_목록_상세정보_지역별_통계_분석결과_요약테이블_최종버전
sheet.query: SELECT TOP 6 CustomerID, CompanyName, ContactName, Country, City, Phone FROM Customer ORDER BY CompanyName

sheet.name: 주문_상세_데이터_년도별_분기별_월별_상세분석_통계보고서_최종본
sheet.query: SELECT TOP 22 OrderDetailID, OrderID, ProductID, Quantity, UnitPrice, (Quantity * UnitPrice) as LineTotal FROM OrderDetail ORDER BY LineTotal DESC

sheet.name: 매출데이터_종합분석_리포트_2024년도_상반기_하반기_통합_최종_검토완료_버전_v2.1_Final
sheet.query: SELECT TOP 10 OrderID, CustomerID, OrderDate, EmployeeID, Freight, CASE WHEN Freight > 50 THEN '고액배송' ELSE '일반배송' END as ShippingType FROM [Order] WHERE OrderDate >= '2024-01-01' ORDER BY Freight DESC
